name: Space Agent
description:
"Space Agent" is 2D Platformer game, I Made the following Modifications:
  •  Modified menu Scene
  • changed the  menu music 
  • buildit 2 Levels 
  • Created a new Skin 
  • added a button in the menu to select  a skin
  • added 3 scripts to mange the selected skin and load it to the game, and  1 script to make the player float in the background of the main menu
Credit:

by Najla Alshehri.

Slime animations is by jasontomlee
